DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , randomize control trial . Pregnant woman early pregnancy randomize either Sleep Study + CPAP group ( n = 180 ) Standard Prenatal Care group ( n = 180 ) . Subjects Sleep Study + CPAP group complete sleep study ( WatchPAT-200 , Itamar Medical , Inc. ) CPAP initiate AHI ≥5 indicate , early late pregnancy , whereas group receive standard prenatal care . All subject complete sleep study 12 week postpartum .
DOC.detailed_description: Objective/Hypothesis : The purpose study determine parturients identify high risk OSA ( define apnea hypopnea index [ AHI ] ≥5 events/hour ; risk factor : prepregnancy BMI≥30 kg/m2 , chronic hypertension , pregestational diabetes ( type 1 type 2 ) , history prior preeclampsia , and/or twin gestation ) randomize receive unattended sleep study early late pregnancy ( early = 6 16 week ; late = 27 33 week ) plus initiation CPAP therapy AHI ≥5 events/hour standard prenatal care decrease incidence adverse pregnancy outcome ( define composite variable include gestational hypertension , preeclampsia , eclampsia , gestational diabetes , preterm birth , low birth weight , stillbirth ) time delivery compare group receive standard prenatal care ( sleep study CPAP initiation ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . At least one follow risk factor OSA : prepregnancy BMI ≥ 30kg/m2 , chronic hypertension , pregestational diabetes , twin gestation , history prior pregnancy affect : preeclampsia , eclampsia fetal growth restriction . 2 . Between 6 16 week gestation time enrollment . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Current diagnosis treatment OSA . 2 . Patient refusal randomization . 3 . Permanent Pacemaker ( interfere WATCHPAT sleep study ) . 4 . Currently take alpha blocker nitrate ( interfere WATCHPAT sleep study ) . 5 . Coronary artery disease congestive heart failure cardiomyopathy . 6 . Not deliver complete postpartum visit NMCSD . 7 . Inability read understand consent . 8 . < 18 year age .
